skillTree.localised_description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!
All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: A Master Engineer knows all about firing rates, fields of fire and the best ratios, his knowledge improving efficiency.

The fact that the Warlock Engineers sell to all sides in the constant Skaven struggle for dominance is well-known; the fact that for a very high price they offer to withhold their services is widely guessed.
A Warpstone-enchanted breastplate and a thick steel helmet are useful to protect the wearer from shrapnel.
This blade is attached to a Warp-generator that channels crackling energy along the weapon.
Engineers use number-lore to work out the best trajectories and prime killing arcs for their war machines.
Those Engineers that spend their lives underground have a good understanding of war in the caverns.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: Those Engineers conversant in ballistics know how best to increase the ranges of their weapons.
A Sapper excels at breaking entrenched foes. He can quickly get artillery into the best position.

	(Hero's army)

Speed: +10% for all Missile units
	(Hero's army)

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "I keep them sharp, yes-yes. Always ready for the challenge that I know is coming, yes-yes!"
"When they come for you, go straight for the throat and tear it clean out. They won't come again."

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +50% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Most precious of all substances, the pulse of our life."

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Warpfire Thrower, Warp Lightning Cannon and Doomwheel units
	(all units in army)

Armour-piercing missile damage: +3 for Plague Claw Catapult, Warp Lightning Cannon and Doomwheel units
	(all units in army)

Construction cost: -10% for Engineering buildings
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +15%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description: Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +500 metres without incurring any time penalty
